Welcome to nCheck, nCino's new automated exercise checking tool.


This tool is for those who are completing hands-on exercises from our Instructor-Led Trainings or our E-Learning.

To use the tool, simply follow the steps of your exercise, then find it below by selecting the correct Wave, Course, and Exercise. Once you click 'Grade' nCheck will check your configuration and either celebrate your success with confetti, or give you field-level feedback for what needs to be changed.


Below you will only find exercises you haven't completed, once you have successfully completed an exercise it will no longer be available in the list below.
